name: Panini Sandwiches
author: Marzetti
summary: Turkey and Swiss cheese panini with sundried tomato mayonnaise made with dinner rolls are quick and delicious!
ingredients: 4  Sister Schubert's Dinner Yeast Rolls, split
4 slices Swiss, Monterey Jack, or Gruyere cheese
1 cup fresh spinach leaves or several fresh basil leaves  (Optional)
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
directions: Preheat grill pan or panini machine to medium heat
Spread center of each roll with 1 tablespoon mayonnaise
Assemble sandwiches with remaining ingredients, except butter
Spread small amount of butter on top and bottom of each roll; place sandwich either in pan on onto panini machine and grill
(If using a pan, press sandwich down with a pan lid
Cook sandwiches about 3 to 4 minutes on each side or until bread is toasted
) For mayonnaise: whisk all ingredients together in small bowl
